rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about migrants and refugees entering the UK illegally, however it's not clear what specific 'emergency legislation and measures' you want the Government to introduce.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

'Take action to make entering the UK illegally extremely unattractive for adults': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600378

'Trial capping net immigration and then gradually reduce it to tens of thousands': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589951
